CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local currentPath = self.Entity.Path
local nameText = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath(currentPath .. "/info_top/text_name") nameText.TextComponent.Text = _UserService.LocalPlayer.PlayerComponent.Nickname self.hpText = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath(currentPath .. "/info_bottom/Hp/text_value").TextComponent
self.hpBar = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath(currentPath .. "/info_bottom/Hp/img_bar").UITransformComponent self.maxWidth = self.hpBar.RectSize.x

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnUpdate
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if self.hpBar ~= nil then local hp = _UserService.LocalPlayer.PlayerComponent.Hp local maxhp = _UserService.LocalPlayer.PlayerComponent.MaxHp self.hpBar.RectSize = Vector2(hp / maxhp * self.maxWidth,self.hpBar.RectSize.y) self.hpText.Text = string.format("%d / %d", hp,maxhp) end
